The grandchild's eyes grew wide in amazement. "What is it?" he asked.
"It's a teaspoon," said Grandma, beaming.
The grandchild examined it carefully. He picked it up and tried to skip with it in his hand.
"Be careful, child," said Grandma. "It's a serious thing."
The grandchild nodded solemnly. Then he carefully put it back in the grass and went on skipping happily around the park.

One day, a little boy named Tim went to the park with his mom. They saw a big tree with many leaves. Tim noticed something unusual under the tree. It was a small, shiny box. Tim was very curious.
Tim asked his mom if he could pick up the box. His mom said yes. Tim opened the box and found a pretty, red ball inside. He was so happy! Tim played with the ball all day long in the park.

The old man smiled and then he said, "as punishment, I have to take your modern bedroom away from you! Goodbye!" The boy started to sob and he tried to plead but the old man had already gone. 
The boy was sad and upset. He never got to play and poke his pillow in his modern bedroom ever again.

the woods. One day, a little squirrel named Sammy joined them. Sammy didn't know about the warning and kicked the ball into the woods. Remy stopped him and said, "We can't go there. My mom warned us that it's dangerous."
Sammy listened to Remy, and they decided to make a new ball from leaves and twigs. They all played happily and safely, thanks to Remy's mom's warning. The friends learned that listening to wise advice keeps them safe and happy.
